channel.title: Natural Son (Social) - Neutral
channel.description:
Natural Son (Social) - Neutral
Lore
The natural son of the King , cast out from the Royal lines at a young age , few remember him but now he has returned to claim his birth right!
Passive: Lust For Power : If nobody of royal blood steps forward you will become king , If you are voted as King rather than a normal king you become Megalomaniac King Day Ability 1: Clear the Line (2 uses): poison a target , they will die in two days time.
Night Ability 1: Research Lineage : Target two players , discover if they have royal blood .
Night Ability 2 (Optional) False Trail : Secretly change who the king targets tonight to a different player .The king will not know his target has been changed .
Win Condition : Life has dealt harshly with you , you cannot win ,
Megalomaniac King (Special) - Neutral
Passive: Paranoia : You surround yourself with Lackeys and Henchmen at all times , this makes you night immune to occupy and death.
Day Ability 1: The Royal Finger : As King
Day Ability 2 (Optional): Rigged Vote (1 use) : Force all players to vote for your target ( even if they are reaped ) . Other players may not vote at the trial .
Night Ability 1: Personal physician : Have your personal physician heal you .
Night Ability 2 (Optional) Extreme Paranoia : Send your personal guard to kill someone .
Lore : the power has gone a bit to his head .
Win Condition : Survive the game
NB Natural son is a nicer way of saying Bastard Prince
